mapper.insert: insert into user(phone, password, wxUserId, realName, nickName, gender, birthday, createdTime, updatedTime, avatarUrl) values (#{phone}, #{password}, #{wxUserId}, #{realName}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{avatarUrl})
mapper.update:
update user
phone=#{phone},
password=#{password},
wxUserId=#{wxUserId},
realName=#{realName},
nickName=#{nickName},
gender=#{gender},
birthday=#{birthday},
createdTime=#{createdTime},
updatedTime=#{updatedTime}
avatarUrl=#{avatarUrl}
mapper.select: select id as id, phone as phone, password as password, wxUserId as wxUserId, realName as realName, nickName as nickName, gender as gender, birthday as birthday, createdTime as createdTime, updatedTime as updatedTime, avatarUrl as avatarUrl from user where phone = #{phone} and password = #{password}
